projects.title: Scrobble

projects.title: Shifthandler
projects.description: When I was working at Anjum hotel I saw my manager struggle with makink shifts scheduale, so I have decided to make a web based shift handler for any manager to easy manage employees shifts to save it as pdf then email it or print it
